import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get statuses for specific workflow"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{workflowId}/statuses"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all ticket statuses available within a specific workflow, including the status sequence, display colors, and which statuses represent closed states. Use this to populate workflow-specific status dropdowns and understand valid status transitions.

**Prerequisites**
1. **workflowId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/workflows](/docs/api/workflows/list-workflows) to list workflows and extract `WorkflowId`, or get from ticket data via [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) → `Item.WorkflowId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Get ticket: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) → extract `WorkflowId`
2. List statuses: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{workflowId\}/statuses](/docs/api/tickets/get-workflow-statuses)
3. Display: Show valid status options for the ticket's workflow
4. Transition: Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/status/\{statusId\}](/docs/api/tickets/set-ticket-status) to change status

**Response Fields**: Each status includes `WorkflowStepId`, `StepName`, `Color`, `IsClosed`, `DisplayOrder`, and transition rules.

**Use Cases**: Building workflow-specific status selectors, validating status transitions, displaying available actions for tickets.

**Note**: For all statuses across all workflows, use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/workflows/statuses](/docs/api/tickets/get-all-workflow-statuses).

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/workflows](/docs/api/workflows/list-workflows) – List all workflows
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/workflows/statuses](/docs/api/tickets/get-all-workflow-statuses) – All statuses across workflows
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/status/\{statusId\}](/docs/api/tickets/set-ticket-status) – Change ticket status

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"workflowId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the workflow","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
